data.title: Robin Wright's Husbands and Relationship History
data.meta_description: Who is Robin Wright dating? Many famous men have dated Robin Wright, and this list will give you more details about these lucky dudes. Including Robin ...
data.text:
Robin Wright and Clement Giraudet began their love story in 2017 when they met during Paris Fashion Week. Quickly, sparks flew between the two, and they were often seen attending various events and vacationing together. Notably, they tied the knot in a private, low-key ceremony in France in August 2018. Their whirlwind romance continues to this day, as they frequently share glimpses of their love on social media

As the head of VIP relations at Saint Laurent, Clement Giraudet has made a name for himself in the world of fashion. He's worked with high-profile clients and celebrities, ensuring their satisfaction with the luxury brand. While he mostly stays out of the spotlight, his marriage to Robin Wright has brought him into the public eye. However, his relationship with the acclaimed actress remains his only known high-profile connection.

In 2011, Robin Wright found love again with her Rampart co-star, Ben Foster. The two quickly became inseparable, and their relationship was heavily documented by the media. From attending numerous red carpet events together to supporting each other at film premieres, their love seemed quite strong. Unfortunately, they called off their engagement in 2015 after four years together.

Ben Foster is a critically acclaimed actor best known for his roles in films such as 3:10 to Yuma, Hell or High Water, and The Messenger. He's garnered praise for his ability to portray complex characters in both films and stage productions. Aside from his relationship with Robin Wright, Foster was previously linked to actress Kirsten Dunst and has since married Orange is the New Black star Laura Prepon, with whom he shares two children.

Robin Wright and Sean Penn's relationship began in the early 1990s and culminated in a marriage that lasted from 1996 to 2010. They met on the set of the film State of Grace, and their relationship thrived despite Penn's tumultuous past. Together, they had two children, Dylan and Hopper, and experienced many ups and downs, including a brief separation in 2007 before ultimately finalizing their divorce in 2010.

Sean Penn is an iconic actor and filmmaker who has been captivating audiences for decades. With Academy Awards for his performances in Mystic River and Milk, he has solidified himself as one of the greats. He's also known for his high-profile relationships, previously married to Madonna and linked to stars such as Scarlett Johansson and Charlize Theron.

In the late 1980s, Robin Wright and Jason Patric were an item after meeting through mutual friends. Their romance was somewhat short-lived, but they were often spotted looking cozy at various Hollywood events. Although not much is known about their time as a couple, their relationship reportedly ended amicably, and they both went on to date other high-profile individuals.

Jason Patric is a seasoned actor known for his roles in films such as The Lost Boys, Speed 2: Cruise Control, and Narc. His talent has made him a recognizable figure in Hollywood, but he's also gained attention for his personal life. Patric has been linked to several famous women, including Julia Roberts and Christy Turlington, making him no stranger to the spotlight.

Robin Wright's first high-profile romance was with her Santa Barbara co-star Dane Witherspoon. The two fell in love on the set of the popular soap opera in the early 1980s and were married from 1986 to 1988. Though their union was short-lived, this relationship marked the beginning of Wright's journey as a sought-after actress and romantic partner in Hollywood.

Dane Witherspoon gained fame as an actor on daytime television, particularly for his role as Joe Perkins in the soap opera Santa Barbara. Despite a successful start in the industry, his career eventually fizzled out after leaving the show. His marriage to Robin Wright remains his most notable connection in the world of celebrity relationships.

In the late 1980s, Robin Wright briefly dated notorious bad-boy, Charlie Sheen. Though theirs was not a long-term relationship, the pair made headlines during their time together. Known for their partying ways, they ultimately went their separate ways but have since spoken fondly of one another.

Charlie Sheen is an actor known for his roles in films such as Platoon and Wall Street, as well as the hit TV series Two and a Half Men. His turbulent personal life, including substance abuse issues and numerous romantic entanglements, has often overshadowed his professional success. Sheen's list of high-profile relationships includes engagements to Kelly Preston and Brett Rossi, as well as marriages to Donna Peele, Denise Richards, and Brooke Mueller.
